info.title: Data Catalogue Metadata API Fixed
info.description:
This API allows you to search, create, update and delete metadata records about data assets published in any data catalogue that implements the [data-catalogue-metadata JSON schema](https://co-cddo.github.io/data-catalogue-metadata/schema).

This JSON schema is based on the [Data Catalog Vocabulary (DCAT) - Version 3](https://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat-3/).

An example of a data catalogue implementing this schema is the [CDDO Data Marketplace](https://datamarketplace.gov.uk).

get.description: You can enter a search term to filter your organisation's datasets in the Data Marketplace.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
This is your search term. The system will look for matches against these fields:
- title - keywords - supplier identifier

value.title: Advance Passenger Information
value.description: Travel data and personal data given to airlines by passenger. API covers  both inbound and outbound air passengers. API includes the passenger’s full name, nationality, date of birth, gender and travel document number, type and country of issue.The data does not include those arriving by sea or rail routes, by private aircraft or via the Common Travel Area (CTA).

CatalogedResource.title: Cataloged Resource schema
CatalogedResource.description: Metadata schema for a Cataloged Resource

accessRights.description: A rights statement that concerns how the distribution is accessed.

created.description: The date when the cataloged resource was first added to cataloge.

creator.description: The organisation responsible for creating the cataloged resource.

description.description: A concise narrative of the content of an cataloged resource.

identifier.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to a cataloged resource within the catalog.

issued.description: The date the cataloged resource was first made available.

license.description: A legal document under which the resource is made available.

title.description: Name or title used to label license

licenseURL.description: The location of the license document

keyword.description: Uncontrolled terms (words or phrases) assigned to describe an information resource.

modified.description: The date on which the data was created or last updated.

publisher.description: The entity responsible for making the cataloged resource publicly available.

securityClassification.description: An information security designation that identifies the minimum level of protection assigned to an information resource.

status.description: Lifecycle status of resource within cataloge

supplierIdentifier.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to a cataloged resource a third party (supplier's) system.

theme.description: Topic: A controlled term that expresses the broad topical content of an information resource. Subject: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.

title.description: The full and formal name given to an information resource. A name given to the distribution.

type.description: Topic: A controlled term that expresses the broad topical content of an information resource. Subject: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.

accessService.description: A reference to the service that provided the data

accessURL.description: The location from which the Dataset can be accessed. To be used instead of downloadURL when describing an API

mediaType.description: The IANA media type, or file format, type, or extention, of the distribution file.

updateFrequency.description: The schedule for how often the data is updated
